metadata.name: New Subscriber Welcome
metadata.description: Welcome new email subscribers and introduce your brand with this warm, relationship-building template. Perfect for building long-term customer relationships.

blocks.content:
Hi {customerName},

We're thrilled to have you join our community! Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter.

Here's what you can expect from us:

• Weekly tips and insights
• Exclusive subscriber-only deals
• Early access to new products
• Helpful resources and guides
We'd love to stay connected! Follow us on social media for tips, updates, and special offers.

Have questions? Just reply to this email—we'd love to hear from you!

With gratitude,
The {companyName} Team
